name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZumaPiano: Learn Piano for free with AI using MIDI or Piano Audio

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZumaPiano - Inspires Piano Learning, it uses AI to convert piano audio or MIDI files to piano lesson

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚≠êÔ∏è What is ZumaPiano?
ZumaPiano helps you learn any piano solo song that you like on internet, simply record the audio and ZumaPiano will prepare a tailored lesson for you.  Plus, if you have MIDI file of piano song, simply upload MIDI file, and ZumaPiano will prepare a tailored lesson for you.

üöÄ ZumaPiano Premium is free for first 5,000 users, please share it among your friends.

‚≠êÔ∏è How to Use ZumaPiano?
its easy as 1-2-3

Create Piano lesson from piano audio:

1. Choose Your Song: Select a piano solo song you love from any website.
2. Record with ZumaPiano Extension: Use the ZumaPiano Chrome extension to record the song. Simply launch the extension and click 'record' to capture the audio.
3. Practice and Explore: Once the recording stops, ZumaPiano will process the audio and generate a guide,Then click ‚ÄúPractice‚Äù in the extension to review the piano roll.

Create Piano lesson from a MIDI file:
1. Choose Your MID File: Click MIDI Upload button and select a file.
2. Upload MIDI File: upload the selected MIDI File.
3. Practice and Explore: once ZumaPiano process MIDI file and lesson is ready click practice.

‚≠êÔ∏è Free vs ZumaPiano Premium 

Our Free Version lets you play the latest two songs, perfect for getting a taste of our AI-powered learning. But why stop there? Upgrade to the Premium Version for just $19.99 (one-time payment) and transform the internet into your limitless song library. Enjoy full access to every feature. It's more than an app; it's an investment in your musical growth.Please note that due to the digital nature of our product, all purchases are final and non-refundable.

‚≠êÔ∏è ZumaPiano Features

1. Enhanced Personal Library: Personalize your piano song library, favorite tracks, edit titles, artists, and images; manage or recover deleted songs.
2. Practice Playlists: Create playlists from your library for tailored piano practice sessions.
3. Flexible Learning Modes: Choose from audio-only sampling or a visual note-playing practice mode.
4. Advanced Player Options: Adjustable playback speeds, volume control, looping, autoplay, and more for an optimized practice.
5. Customizable Note Display: Toggle note name display on notes for a learning experience tailored to your preference.
